name: Selling Souls
description:
Synopsis.
The protagonist starts a part-time job at a nearby Internet cafe to pay off his scholarship...


Contents
Selling Souls will be a walking simulator game in which players explore their surroundings, find items, and advance the story
You will perform tasks such as serving food, cleaning used seats, and returning manga
Experience a terrifying story as you perform your duties

Play time: about 30 minutes
